QuestData.Title: Nar'thalas Still Suffers
QuestData.Description: They have not forgiven me. I cannot blame them.$b$bPast crimes aside, I am still their prince. Even in death, I will do what I can to protect my people.$b$b$n. Act as my champion. Find and defeat the creature that leads this naga attack against the people of Nar'thalas. After all these years, you - |5$r $c, of all things - may be the instrument of my redemption.
QuestData.CompletionText: I will make it up to them. WE will make it up to them.
QuestData.RewardText: She spoke of the Tidestone? That sea witch must not realize how close she truly is to finding it.$b$bWe should move quickly. We are close to your prize, and the naga are circling in.
